title: PBS.Hallowed.Grounds.Americas.Overseas.Military.Cemeteries.720p
description:
Hallowed Grounds: America's Overseas Military Cemeteries

War Documentary hosted by Peter Thomas, published by PBS in 2009 - English narration
 <a href="
http://docuwiki.net/images/6/60/Hallowed-Grounds-America-s-Overseas-Military-Cemeteries-Cover.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://docuwiki.net/images/6/60/Hallowed-Grounds-America-s-Overseas-Military-Cemeteries-Cover.jpg</a>

Information
------------------------------

This hour-long program visits twenty-two America's overseas military cemeteries in eight different countries. Each of these places is a national treasure, with fascinating stories to tell. The program weaves elements of a historical documentary with beautiful, contemporary scenes of the cemeteries, and powerful stories about the men and women who are buried in them.
